page.title: 04THE A435 CHELTENHAM ROAD.
page.content: The A435 Cheltenham road has 2 lanes and a speed limit of 60mph. There are a lot of corners so there is not much room for over taking. There are no traffic lights or pedestrian crossings because few people live in the area and there are no major junctions. The A435 is a busy road as it is the main link between Cheltenham and Cirencester. There are 2 petrol stations along the route,both sell used cars. The road is fairly flat but the surface is rather rough. There are no street lamps,but many trees over hang the road and are brushed by large vehicles.
